attributes.action: Make the retirement age for men and women the same.
attributes.background: Men die on average about four years earlier than women. Yet they retire five years later. This is an inequality that needs to be resolved in a modern 'equal opportunities for all' country like Great Britain.

rejection.details:
Parliament has already passed legislation to equalise the state pension age. You can find out more about this here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN06546/SN06546.pdf

If you would like these changes to be implemented more quickly, you could start a petition asking for that.
